translations.fr:
: ** :beers: Vous entrez dans un bar, et le barman vous interpelle, vous disant qu'il aimerait "tester de nouvelles boissons" sur vous.

:beer: Accepter de servir de cobaye
:x: Refuser sa proposition
:moneybag: Refuser, et tenter de voler des gens

translations.en:
: ** :beers: You walk into a bar and the bartender calls out to you, telling you that he would like to "test new drinks" on you.

:beer: Accept the proposal
:x: Refuse the proposal
:moneybag:Refuse, and try to rob other customers

*-Use the reactions to take an action. :warning: Not reacting is also considered a choice!*

translations.en: ** | ğŸº You, without further ado, take the mug filled with a thick, greenish liquid he holds out to you. You drink it in one gulp. A few seconds later, you realize how horrible it tastes and you throw up on the floor. The bartender apologizes and gives you a handful of coins as compensation, but you don't feel well. :sick:
